For those who do not think we need marriage or that there are other legal means to protect our families consider this
 
 
 
 http://www.pridesource.com/article.shtml?article=25755
 
"That's against company policy."
 
 "We have to follow our regulations."
 
 "I'm not authorized to authorize that."
 
 "The rules are the rules."

 
 This means that even though we have powers of attorneys, wills, and other legal documents we still are considered strangers unless we have that marriage paper. A scary thought if you travel or live in virginia.(yes I know the story takes place in florida)

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Creep of the week
